titleStmt.title: Sad newes out of Kent: certified in a letter from Chattum : of the rising at Maydstone, Rochester, and other parts. Their resolutions concerning their joyning in armes. And their intentions to randezvouse at Blackheath. May. 24. 1648. Imprimatur, Gilb. Mabbott.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Becke, and are to be sold in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
